org.objectweb.cjdbc.common.xml
Class ControllerXmlTags

java.lang.Object
  org.objectweb.cjdbc.common.xml.ControllerXmlTags
public final class ControllerXmlTags
extends java.lang.Object

List of the xml tags recognized to read and write the controller configuration with.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Nicolas Modrzyk , Emmanuel Cecchet
